TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GridViewDeletedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当单击控件中的 "删除" 按钮（其 `CommandName` 属性设置为 "Delete"）时， 控件将引发 事件，但在 控件删除记录后。The control raises the event when a Delete button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Delete") within the control is clicked, but after the control deletes the record. 这使你可以提供一种事件处理方法，该方法执行自定义例程，如在此事件发生时检查删除操作的结果。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as checking the results of a delete operation, whenever this event occurs. 将 对象传递到事件处理方法，该方法允许你确定受影响的记录数以及可能已发生的任何异常。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the number of records affected and any exceptions that might have occurred. 若要确定受删除操作影响的记录数，请使用 属性。To determine the number of records affected by the delete operation, use the property. 使用 属性来确定是否发生了异常。Use the property to determine whether any exceptions occurred. 还可以通过设置 属性，指示是否已在事件处理方法中处理异常。You can also indicate whether the exception was handled in the event-handling method by setting the property. > [!NOTE] > 如果在删除操作过程中发生异常并且 属性设置为 `false`，则 控件将重新引发异常。If an exception occurs during the delete operation and the property is set to `false`, the control re-throws the exception. 如果要访问已删除记录的键字段和非键字段的名称/值对，请分别使用 "" 和 "" 属性。If you want to access the name/value pairs of the key fields and non-key fields of the deleted record, use the and properties, respectively. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用传递到 事件的事件处理方法的 对象来确定删除操作过程中是否发生了异常。The following example demonstrates how to use the object passed to the event-handling method for the event to determine whether an exception occurred during a delete operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewDeletedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewDeletedEventArgs/CS/gridviewdeletedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewDeletedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewDeletedEventArgs/VB/gridviewdeletedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数初始化 类的新实例。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 下表显示了 实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |属性Property|初始值Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`affectedRows` 参数的值。The value of the `affectedRows` parameter.| ||`e` 参数中包含的 对象。The object contained in the `e` parameter.| ||初始化为 `false`。Initialized to `false`.| > [!NOTE] > 此构造函数主要由控件开发人员在引发事件时使用。This constructor is used primarily by control developers when raising events.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AffectedRows As Integer
public: property int AffectedRows { int get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取受删除操作影响的行数。

span.span: Gets the number of rows affected by the delete operation.

value.span: 受删除操作影响的行数。

span.span: The number of rows affected by the delete operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性来确定受删除操作影响的记录数。Use the property to determine the number of records affected by the delete operation. 此属性通常用于验证是否在下列情况下删除了正确的记录数：This property is commonly used to verify that the correct number of records was deleted in the following situations: - 验证是否只删除了单个记录。Verify that only a single record was deleted. 有时，错误编写的 delete 语句可以删除多个记录。Sometimes an improperly written delete statement can delete multiple records. - 当在不引发异常的删除操作过程中发生错误时，验证是否已删除记录。Verify that a record was deleted when an error occurs during the delete operation that does not raise an exception. - 验证在支持开放式并发的数据源控件（如 和 控件）的数据源控件将其 属性设置为 `ConflictOptions.CompareAllValues` 枚举值时，是否已删除记录。Verify that a record was deleted when a data source control that supports optimistic concurrency (such as the and controls) has its property set to the `ConflictOptions.CompareAllValues` enumeration value. 在此设置下，其他用户同时修改的记录可能不会被删除。Under this setting, a record that has been modified by another user concurrently might not be deleted. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性验证在删除操作过程中是否删除了记录。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to verify that a record was deleted during the delete operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewDeletedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewDeletedEventArgs/CS/gridviewdeletedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewDeletedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewDeletedEventArgs/VB/gridviewdeletedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Exception As Exception
public: property Exception ^ Exception { Exception ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取在删除操作过程中引发的异常（如果引发）。

span.span: Gets the exception (if any) that was raised during the delete operation.

value.span: 一个 对象，表示删除操作过程中引发的异常。

span.span: An that represents the exception that was raised during the delete operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性来确定在删除操作过程中引发的异常。Use the property to determine the exception that was raised during the delete operation. 如果未引发异常，此属性将返回 `null`。If no exceptions were raised, this property returns `null`. > [!NOTE] > 如果引发了异常，并且您决定在事件处理程序中处理异常，请确保将 属性设置为 `true`;否则， 控件会重新引发异常。If an exception was raised and you decide to handle the exception in the event handler, be sure to set the property to `true`; otherwise, the control re-throws the exception. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性来确定删除操作过程中是否发生了异常。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to determine whether an exception occurred during a delete operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewDeletedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewDeletedEventArgs/CS/gridviewdeletedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewDeletedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewDeletedEventArgs/VB/gridviewdeletedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ExceptionHandled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.ExceptionHandled : bool with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在事件处理程序中处理了删除操作中引发的异常。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an exception that was raised during the delete operation was handled in the event handler.

value.span: 如果异常已在事件处理程序中得到处理，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the exception was handled in the event handler; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在删除操作过程中引发了异常，则使用 属性指示是否已在事件处理程序中处理异常。When an exception is raised during the delete operation, use the property to indicate whether the exception was handled in the event handler. 如果将此属性设置为 "`true`"，则会将异常视为已处理并且不会重新引发。When this property is set to `true`, the exception is considered handled and is not re-thrown. 如果将此属性设置为 `false`， 控件将重新引发异常。If this property is set to `false`, the control re-throws the exception. 若要确定引发的异常，请使用 属性。To determine which exception was raised, use the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性来指示在事件处理程序中已处理异常。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to indicate that the exception was handled in the event handler. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewDeletedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewDeletedEventArgs/CS/gridviewdeletedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewDeletedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewDeletedEventArgs/VB/gridviewdeletedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Keys As IOrderedDictionary

summary.span: 获取已删除记录的键字段名/值对的排序字典。

span.span: Gets an ordered dictionary of key field name/value pairs for the deleted record.

value.span: 包含已删除记录的键字段名称/值对的顺序字典的 。

span.span: A that contains an ordered dictionary of key field name/value pairs for the deleted record.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可访问已删除记录的键字段（由 属性指定）的值。Use the property to access the values of the key fields (as specified by the property) for a deleted record. 例如，您可以使用这些值来记录已删除的记录。For example, you can use these values to keep a log of deleted records. > [!NOTE] > 此属性仅包含键字段。This property contains only the key fields. 若要访问非键字段，请使用 属性。To access the non-key fields, use the property. 属性返回一个实现 接口的对象。The property returns an object that implements the interface. 对象包含 对象，这些对象表示已删除记录的键字段。The object contains objects that represent the key fields of the deleted record. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性访问已删除记录的键字段的值。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to access the values of the key fields for a deleted record. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewDeletedEventArgsKeys#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewDeletedEventArgsKeys/CS/gridviewdeletedeventargskeyscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewDeletedEventArgsKeys#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewDeletedEventArgsKeys/VB/gridviewdeletedeventargskeysvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Values As IOrderedDictionary

summary.span: 获取包含已删除记录所对应的非键字段名称/值对的字典。

span.span: Gets a dictionary of the non-key field name/value pairs for the deleted record.

value.span: 包含已删除记录的非键字段名称/值对的字典的 。

span.span: A that contains a dictionary of the non-key field name/value pairs for the deleted record.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可访问已删除记录的非键字段的值。Use the property to access the values of the non-key fields for a deleted record. 例如，您可以使用这些值来记录已删除的记录。For example, you can use these values to keep a log of deleted records. > [!NOTE] > 仅当在项模板中使用双向绑定表达式时，才填充 属性。The property is populated only when two-way binding expressions are used in the item template. 有关双向绑定表达式的详细信息，请参阅[绑定到数据库](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178361(v=vs.100))。For more information on two-way binding expressions, see [Binding to Databases](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178361(v=vs.100)). 属性返回一个实现 接口的对象。The property returns an object that implements the interface. 对象包含 对象，这些对象表示已删除记录的非键字段。The object contains objects that represent the non-key fields of the deleted record. > [!NOTE] > 此属性不包含已删除记录的键字段（由 属性指定）。This property does not contain the key fields (as specified by the property) for the deleted record. 若要访问密钥字段，请使用 属性。To access the key fields, use the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性访问已删除记录的非键字段的值。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to access the values of the non-key fields for a deleted record. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewDeletedEventArgsKeys#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewDeletedEventArgsKeys/CS/gridviewdeletedeventargskeyscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewDeletedEventArgsKeys#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewDeletedEventArgsKeys/VB/gridviewdeletedeventargskeysvb.aspx#1)]
